title: How to Make Wassail (a Warm Punch)

steps.title: Warm apple cider in a stock pot.
steps.content: Warm apple cider in a stock pot.

steps.title: Wrap whole allspice and whole cloves in cheesecloth or a tea ball.
steps.content: Wrap whole allspice and whole cloves in cheesecloth or a tea ball.

steps.title: Add this spice packet to pot along with the cinnamon sticks.
steps.content: Add this spice packet to pot along with the cinnamon sticks.

steps.title: Remove spice sack and cinnamon sticks.
steps.content: Remove spice sack and cinnamon sticks.

steps.title: Add 1/4 cup brown sugar, if desired, for more sweetness.
steps.content: Add 1/4 cup brown sugar, if desired, for more sweetness.

steps.title: Serve warm, garnished with orange slices.
steps.content: Serve warm, garnished with orange slices.
